ValidationRule.description: Validation for entering 2-digit valid Canada Province Code.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( And(NOT( OR( IsPickVal($User.Region__c,"EU"), IsPickVal( $User.Business_Division__c,"DN"))), OR(MailingCountry = "CA"), OR( LEN(MailingCountry ) < 2, NOT( CONTAINS("AB:BC:MB:NB:NL:NS:NT:NU:ON:PE:QC:SK:YT", MailingState) ))), And(NOT( OR( IsPickVal($User.Region__c,"EU"), IsPickVal( $User.Business_Division__c,"DN"))), OR(OtherCountry = "CA"), OR( LEN(OtherCountry ) < 2, NOT( CONTAINS("AB:BC:MB:NB:NL:NS:NT:NU:ON:PE:QC:SK:YT", OtherState) )))),(RecordTypeId = "012800000003ZTZ"|| RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoB' || RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoL'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must provide a valid 2-digit Canada Province code.
